title: Stealing Hugo
description: Stealing Hugo is also available in the collection of short stories, 'Places Where The Moon Never Shines' which is available in paperback and kindle. This novella is the story of Nick Pike and his nephew Peter. Despite their dislike for one another they put their differences aside for one last job. Peter is an opportunist thief intent on getting rich, Nick is a dreamer looking for love and adventure. Already in trouble for their last caper, an opportunity presents itself which is too good to pass up. It's all or nothing as the two of them plan the robbery, but the key to their unimaginable riches is held by a detainee at the Hailsbury Psychiatric Hospital. Will Peter's desire for wealth be their downfall? Will Nick's new lover blow the gig? Or have they both made a grave mistake?
author: Leon Thornton
